gw.api.contact

Class ProximitySearchPageHelper.ProximitySearchParameterHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.contact.ProximitySearchPageHelper.ProximitySearchParameterHelper
  • Enclosing class:
    ProximitySearchPageHelper

    public class ProximitySearchPageHelper.ProximitySearchParameterHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    An helper class used to assemble dropdowns for selecting the radius or nearest-n for a search. 
     return addressBookPageHelper.paramsFor(searchCriteria).

    • Method Detail

      • addMiles

        public ProximitySearchPageHelper.ProximitySearchParameterHelper addMiles(int number)
        Adds a search with a 'number' miles radius to the dropdown.
        Parameters:
        number - the radius, in miles, to add to the dropdown
        Returns:
        the ProximitySearchParameterHelper object, allowing these calls to be chained.

      • addKilometers

      • range

        public ProximitySearchParameters[] range()
        Generates the dropdown for selecting the parameters for a proximity search. The dropdown is used to select a radius or number of n-nearest search items.
        Returns:
        a ProximitySearchParameters array containing the drop-down parameters
